title: The unseen champ. Does he need a rework?
body: Hey guys so I was just wondering if I am right here. I see Nocturne played once every 80-100 games and he really doesn't give much to the team. He was completely left out on the assassin rework and doesn't do much in general. Maybe its just cause I'm in low elo I don't know buuuut please gimme some feedback on what you think.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Full tank noc, with titanic, people don't understand how OP he is :) i am one of the few people who still plays him

yeh... he's a weird one. I think he is still an "acceptable champion" but as you said, it hard to see what he provides that is unique.

I mean, you play him full damage and he can be an assassin. But you can play Vi half tank and do a similar job. Noc Ult certainly has more range than Vi which is nice, but Vi is innately tanky with her passive and new mastery.

Reksai too, is just a better version of Nocturne imo.

There are champions like FIddlesticks, Nocturne, Aatrox, etc that are "acceptable" champions but have been out of meta for a rather long time. They will def need a look at.

But im happy to see that {{champion:19}} is next up on the champion update list.
Aatrox is generally unacceptable. Most people flame at me when I pick him, even though he's my main. Now I just play Talon jungle. It's more fun, and I don't get flamed as often.

The reason Riot gave for leaving him out is because he is a diver not an assassin (the difference being Assassin's can get back out, Diver's generally can't)

And unfortunately he is a champion that you dive in, and either you die, or your targets die, and it's all about who snowballed.

Now that you've brought Nocturne to our attention, I do agree, he's not 'underwhelming' but a really 'un-included' champion, like not 'forgotten' but 'overlooked'. I do wish he gets a rework cuz his kit just seems unimportant; except for his ultimate, his ultimate can stay forever

I'm glad yuou have seen him recently, because he shits on the cotc meta right now. build bloodrazor into botrk and shred both squishies and tanks. i have seen him in maybe 4 of my last 20 games? hes a menace, but its so satisfying to watching him rip through a tank just to dive into the soft fleshy adc at the back
